author: Staff Reporter
text:
A man, who was accused of murdering his wife, was awarded life sentence by the IV Additional District and Sessions Court here on Monday.

R. Uma (26), wife of Raman (30) from Pungaikulam near Tirumangalam, was found murdered on August 25, 2013. Tirumangalam Taluk police, who investigated the case, booked Raman for allegedly killing his wife.

Raman’s parents were also booked in the murder case.

Fine

While acquitting his parents, IV Additional District and Sessions Court Judge C. Sanjai Baba sentenced Raman to life imprisonment and slapped him with a fine of Rs. 2,000.
title: Life term for uxoricide
